languages.english-overview:
Prismotube Express is the free basic version of Prismotube without all the bells and whistles. It is a video script that is based on the Youtube API that allows you to build a video site on any topic in record time.
All you need is a couple of keywords.
Prismotube Express comes with in-built smart video script with a unique AutoSmart Content™ and Auto-Refrez™ technology.
Prismotube Express is released under their Custom License Agreement.

li.font: Add a video section to your existing site
AutoSmart Content™ technology pulls in video contents from the Youtube API based on your keywords
Auto-Refrez™ refreshes the contents everyday without your intervention
